full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## THS - Special Advisor
### Contract Number: cb-68-17280313
#### Amendment Number: 2

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**

The Government of Canada invites proposals from qualified suppliers to provide **Information Technology Consultation Services** (UNSPSC Code: 80101507) for the Department of National Defense (DND)/Digital Transformation Office (DTO).

### Project Description

The DND/DTO requires a Special Advisor - Senior to develop a roadmap for effective implementation of Data Management elements, with the Data Catalog as its core. The contractor's resource will collaborate with senior management and various stakeholders to develop and align data governance and data strategy frameworks.

### Important Details

* Duration: 48 weeks (May 1st, 2024, to March 28th, 2025)
* Estimated level of effort: 1725 hours
* Security requirement: Reliability
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Ottawa
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada, and Ottawa

### Eligibility

This procurement is set aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. Suppliers must be Supply Arrangement Holders under EN578-172870 who qualify under the following stream(s): Policy and Advisory Services, Category 9, and Level of Expertise: Senior.

### Tender Process

The Government of Canada will award the contract based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. Interested suppliers must submit their proposal to the Department of National Defense.

### Contact Information

Raghid Fathallah, Contracting Authority
Email: [raghid.fathallah@forces.gc.ca](mailto:raghid.fathallah@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 549-0501

### Important Dates

* Publication Date: 2024-04-05
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-04-19 T 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2024-04-19 ( Latest revision: **Modification 2ández happened on today 2024-04-19**)  - though maybe you want to variant reword for Less likely readability permalink
